mapper.sql: select mcu_type, id, create_time, update_time, dept_id, template_id, is_auto_create_template, start_time, end_time , status, extend_minutes, repeat_rate, is_hang_up, repeat_date, password, attendee_limit, is_start , start_failed_reason, type, create_by, approval_id, room_book_id from view_conference_appointment
mapper.select: SELECT a.dept_id, count(*) appointment_count FROM view_conference_appointment a LEFT JOIN view_template_conference c ON a.mcu_type = c.mcu_type and a.template_id = c.id WHERE business_field_type = #{businessFieldType} and a.type IN (0, 1, 2, 3) GROUP BY a.dept_id ORDER BY a.dept_id ASC
